dct_description_sm: At page top, above map: DE L'AMERIQUE. [page] 307 [,] FIGURE CXXXIII. [Figure] 307 (map top right). Vij (page bottom right). Spelling in title as Mexiqve and Novvelle. California labeled I. Californie. Text on verso entitled "De la Ville de Mexique, Capitale de la nouvelle Espagne. Issued in his: Description de l'univers, Tome V, Paris, 1683.

At page top, above map: Mexica oder Neu Spannien. Fig: 23 (map top right). California labeled Californie I. With French title inside border and German title outside border. Spelling in title changed to Mexique and Nouvelle. Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des ganzen Welt-Kreisses ..., V, Franckfurt, 1684. Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des gantzen weltkreises ..., J.A. Jung ... Frankfurt am Mayn 1719
BN Manesson-Mallet I A(640) & I B; Faupel's Americana 91/434.
